bill.title: Accelerating Veterans Recovery Outdoors Act
bill.description: Requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to establish the Task Force on Outdoor Recreation for Veterans to report on and make recommendations regarding the use of public lands or other outdoor spaces for medical treatment and therapy for veterans.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

calendar.description: House Committee on Veterans' Affairs Hearing
